title: The Optus thing
body:
Well, I received a ban because after I kept joining games, it kept saying 'cannot connect to the server' and how many times I retried, it kicked me anyways(i tried three games). So apparently I dced even though I was still in the game and could not play but only spectate the game that I was in. Just wondering if the ban could be lifted because these bans are very annoying and when you are queuing it doesn't let you go to the store or do anything other than click leave queue

This is what you should have if it is happening to you as well
https://youtu.be/h6z7lIbTE4Y

replies.body:
Same thing happened to me.

I've got a 10 game low priority level game. Now I have to wait 10 minute in q for the next 10 games, because my game wouldn't connect. Im so sad, I have been away the whole week, i just wanted to play some league on the weekend and now this. So disappointing.

dude the same thing happened to me, i was playing a game and after champ select my screen turned white and then said couldnt connect to server then i pressed retry like about 1000 times. i eventually gave up theni got put in a low priority queue. please help me i hate this

Hi

Sorry to hear you've been affected by the Optus issues.  I'd suggest you send in a support ticket about this, they should be able to have a look and help you out.

Cheers
Mindstar

And also if you can help me with this because it says I must be logged in, but am I not logged in?
https://imgur.com/a/36sV0E3

I'm not really sure how to make a support ticket if you can kindly help me. And now I have a 20 min leaverbuster for every game now because of this so I'm not planning on spending that much time, and if this ban could be removed?
Thanks for your help. Its just sad as to how this gives you leaverbuster and restricts you from playing more games

OCE is literally incapable of helping you. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
You have to go to the NA support page and get them to review your support ticket and remove the leaver penalty which will probably take a day. such a great system wow
Ye ik i found it I had to do some signing out and crap like that. I just hope that this get resolved soon. As the server seems to be fine for a few games then it just breaks completely.
I was also gonna stream today coz I only have time on Saturdays and Sundays, but no this happens

https://youtu.be/h6z7lIbTE4Y

That is a link of what happened to me once again. Now im going to try going onto a VPN

My mum got frustrated at me watching YT coz "I was gaining nothing whatsoever" and she said If I actually made money she would re-think the idea, but RIP I'm delayed now. + if you get a queue timer make a support thread , that's what I did and I hope it's removed coz it's a 20 min queue timer and I'm not gonna wait that long to just realised my server won't be able to connect again.

FYI - There's also a [thread on the Optus boards](https://yescrowd.optus.com.au/t5/Broadband-Telephony/League-of-legends-message/m-p/422504#M51254/jump-to/first-unread-message) about this issue.

It may be worth adding your voice there to help them understand how many of their customers are affected...
